scripts.install:pandoc: cd /home && yum install wget tar gzip texlive-xetex -y && wget hhttps://github.com/jgm/pandoc/releases/download/3.1.6.1/pandoc-3.1.6.1-linux-amd64.tar.gz && tar -xvf pandoc-3.1.6.1-linux-amd64.tar.gz && ln -s /home/pandoc-3.1.6.1/bin/pandoc /usr/bin/pandoc && pandoc -v
scripts.install:clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install && npm run dev
